title: Officials identify Park County hunter killed in apparent accidental shooting
content:
Park County officials have identified a man who died last week in an apparent hunting accident as 37-year-old Gavin Peck of Clyde Park.
On Nov. 15 at about 6:40 p.m., the Park County Sheriff’s Office was notified after Peck failed to call his children. At 11:10 p.m. his body was discovered near his vehicle about two miles up Daisy Dean Road, northeast of Wilsall, said Sheriff Scott Hamilton.
